t: DeepCool penalizes Chinese distributor for selling sanctioned products on Amazon in the US — blurred logo and brand name change violated contract | Tom's Hardware
s: August 30, 2024 - US-sanctioned DeepCool contacted Tom's Hardware to state that it had nothing to do with the Shaking Tank Amazon store selling its products with blurred logos. A company rep tells us it has taken action against the seller, who was violating its contract with DeepCool.
